iridium_user_settings.confirm_reset:
You are about to reset your settings. It is advised to backup your current settings before continuing.

Do you wish to contiue?
iridium_user_settings.reset_success:
Settings have been reset.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
iridium_user_settings.confirm_import:
You are about to override your current settings. It is advised to backup your current settings before continuing.

Do you wish to contiue?
iridium_user_settings.import_success:
Your settings have been imported with success.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
iridium_user_settings.import_error: Your settings could not be imported because they appear to be invalid.

iridium_language.confirm_save:
You are about to replace your extension language settings.

Do you wish to continue?
iridium_language.save_success:
New language saved successfully.

Changes will be applied after a page refresh.
iridium_language.save_error: The new language could not be saved because it appears to be invalid.
